name: Agro Tour Trip in UPM
description:
Orchards, vegetable farms, and lush vegetation are waiting to be discovered in here, the University Putra Malaysia (UPM). Located in the middle of the hustle and bustle Kuala Lumpur, UPM covers an area of ​​1,108 hectares, the university has many attractive researching sites with special infrastructure and unique natural landscape.

Agricultural Conservatory Park, Museum of Human Anatomy, Equine Center, deer farms, cattle farms are some attractions of UPM that you can visit.
